Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh dismissed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya got a wicket in the seventh over
Jasprit Bumrah then struck in the ninth
Pandya added two more wickets to his tally
Axar Patel got one in the only over of spin in the innings through a brilliant catch
India chased the target down in 12.2 overs
India dismissed Ireland for just 96 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and chose to bowl first
No Kuldeep Yadav, Yashasvi Jaiswal for India

Paul Stirling(c), Andrew Balbirnie, Lorcan Tucker(w), Harry Tector, Curtis Campher, George Dockrell, Gareth Delany, Ross Adair, Barry McCarthy, Mark Adair, Joshua Little, Craig Young, Benjamin White, Neil Rock, Graham Hume - Ireland full squad

Rohit Sharma(c), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant(w), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj, Yuzvendra Chahal, Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube - India full squad
Post-Match Reflections: India vs Ireland, T20 World Cup 2024 Highlights: India's fast bowlers ripped the Ireland batting order apart and the latter were all out for a score of just 96 in 16 overs
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant then helped India to an eight-wicket win
India's seniormost players in recent T20Is - Rohit Sharma (3), Virat Kohli, Ravindra Jadeja and Jasprit Bumrah (2 games each) - have largely been missing from these contests
Miscellaneous Highlights: End of powerplay, India 39/1 in 6 overs
GONE! Kohli's opening act ends early
India vs Ireland, T20 World Cup 2024 Highlights: IND thrash IRE by eight wickets
India's fast bowlers ripped the Ireland batting order apart and the latter were all out for a score of just 96 in 16 overs
